text: Thomas F Hamill is a former Scottish international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== He won two silver medals in the pairs with Michael Purdon and fours at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth with Joseph Black, William Moore and Michael Purdon. ==References== Category:Date of birth unknown Category:Scottish male bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Scotland Category:Bowls players at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Thomas Hamill (bowls)
